page.title: 13CLUBS-ANSTEY
page.content: In Anstey there are Beavers, Cubs, Scouts and Adventure Scouts for boys to join. For girls, there are Brownies, Guides and Rangers.Others are Robins, Boys Brigade, Girls Brigade which are run by the church. These clubs are for children from 5 and over. There are the Swifts football team, dancing classes, St.Johns Ambulance, play groups, Morris Dancing, Sunday School. Other things to do are self defence, Gynsill Tennis Club, keep fit,yoga,Womens Institute, garland dancing, Mums and Toddlers, Young Wives, Coffee mornings, Toc H and Youth Clubs. The Toc H take old people on trips and have coffee mornings.
